Command.CommandString: INSERT INTO CMD_PRODUCT(ProductCode,ProductNo, ProductName, ProductEName, Spec, Propertity,Weight, ModelNo, StandardNo, PartNo, Memo,Creator, CreateDate, Updater, UpdateDate, AreaCode,CategoryCode,FactoryID) values(@ProductWMSCode, @ProductCode, @ProductName, @ProductEName, @Size, @AlloyTemper, @Weight, @ProductType, @StandardNo, @PartNo, @Memo,'WebServices',getdate(),'WebServices',getdate(),'001','0002','0000000001')

update CMD_PRODUCT set ProductNo=@ProductCode,ProductName=@ProductName, ProductEName=@ProductEName, Spec=@Size, Propertity=@AlloyTemper,Weight=@Weight, ModelNo=@ProductType, StandardNo=@StandardNo, PartNo=@PartNo, Memo=@Memo,UpdateDate=getdate() where ProductNo=@ProductOldCode and Spec=@OldSize

INSERT INTO WMS_BillTemp(BillType, BillNo, BillDate, BatchNo, ProductCode, Size, Weight, Quantity, Memo,CreateDate) values(@BillType,@BillNo,@BillDate,@BatchNo,@ProductCode,@Size,@Weight,@Quantity,@Memo,getdate())
delete from WMS_BillTemp where BillNo=@BillNo and BillType=@BillType

insert into WMS_BillMaster(BillID,BillDate,BillTypeCode,FactoryID,SourceBillNo,Memo,BatchNo,Creator,CreateDate,Updater,UpdateDate,State,Checker,CheckDate) select distinct @BillID,BillDate,'001','00001',BillNo,'','','WebServices',GETDATE(),'WebServices',GETDATE(),1,'WebServices',GETDATE() from WMS_BillTemp where BillNo=@BillNo and BillType='IS'

insert into WMS_BillDetail(BillID,RowID,ProductCode,Quantity,Weight,Barcode,Memo) select @BillID,ROW_NUMBER() over(order by wms_billtemp.productcode,size),CMD_Product.ProductCode, Quantity,wms_billtemp.Weight,BatchNo,wms_billtemp.Memo from WMS_BillTemp left join CMD_Product on WMS_BillTemp.ProductCode=CMD_Product.ProductNo and WMS_BillTemp.Size=CMD_Product.Spec where BillNo=@BillNo and BillType='IS'

insert into WMS_BillMaster(BillID,BillDate,BillTypeCode,SourceBillNo,Memo,BatchNo,Creator,CreateDate,Updater,UpdateDate,State,Checker,CheckDate) select distinct @BillID,BillDate,'020',BillNo,'','','WebServices',GETDATE(),'WebServices',GETDATE(),1,'WebServices',GETDATE() from WMS_BillTemp where BillNo=@BillNo and BillType='OS'

insert into WMS_BillDetail(BillID,RowID,ProductCode,Quantity,Weight,Barcode,Memo) select @BillID,ROW_NUMBER() over(order by wms_billtemp.productcode,size),CMD_Product.ProductCode, Quantity,wms_billtemp.Weight,BatchNo,wms_billtemp.Memo from WMS_BillTemp left join CMD_Product on WMS_BillTemp.ProductCode=CMD_Product.ProductNo and WMS_BillTemp.Size=CMD_Product.Spec where BillNo=@BillNo and BillType='OS'

select main.SourceBillNo as BillNo,sub.Barcode as BatchNo,task.AreaCode from WMS_BillMaster Main left join WMS_BillDetail Sub on main.BillID=sub.BillID left join WCS_TASK task on task.ProductCode=sub.ProductCode and task.Barcode=sub.Barcode where main.BillID=@BillID
update WMS_BillMaster set IsUpERP=@IsUpERP,ErpMSG=@ErpMSG where BillID=@BillID
